actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for establishment of the Father Marquette National Memorial in St. Ignac, Mich., and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to provide for the establishment of the Father Marquette National Memorial in Saint Ignac, Michigan. Authorizes the appropriation of up to $500,000 to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for establishment of the Father Marquette National Memorial in St. Ignac, Mich., and for other purposes.
